title: Can't make an account
body: My sister wants to get into the League of legends, but after letting her have a few goes on my old account she wants her own. I tried to do it this morning but to my surprise it would always fail without specifying why. Changed DoB, usernames, passwords, emails, everything. I don't know what went wrong and would like some help. Even tried to sign her up on my phone which didn't work.
